about_the_game:
Leaden Sky: Nightmares is a linear single player, FPS horror game, prequel to story of original Leaden Sky (not a replacement for it)

This is EARLY ACCESS and NOT full game.

GAMEPLAY:

Leaden Sky: Nightmares is a horror game with a solid and responsive combat system, the weapons are designed to feel effective and fun to use, on top of that the character movement includes ability to lean around corners, reloading while aiming down sights and dodge, which is helping to create intensive encounters.

Enemy AI is aggresive and unpredictable, resulting in unique encounters each time. You will often see enemies in unexpected areas, this creates horror experience without jumpscares.

STORY:

The story revolves around half-polish U.S. Army veteran - Kyle Anderson, who resigned army to seek for peaceful life as power plant security guard in Poland. Said power plant uses experimental techonology based on one of Tesla's prototypes, this required modification of already existing coal based power plant.

As the time passes Kyle starts noticing strange electrical phenomena in his workplace and hearing strange stories from people living in the city, which gives him nightmares.
One day he witnessed something terrifying at his workplace...

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violent combat scenes with blood and dismemberment, it's also featuring disturbing enemy designs partially based on burned bodies.
